item.title: Vilakku Pooja Details
item.description: Please note that no one will be allowed to join the pooja or visit the koil on August 14th in the evening. This is a zoom event. The cost will be $15 for each participating person. When registering please provide one email for the primary participant as the main SANGALPAM. Zoom call-in details will be sent to that email address. PLEASE DO NOT PROVIDE EMAILS FOR OTHER SANGALPAM PEOPLE.
